ComicInfo.Summary: The Monster Within Part One: Brothers Under the Skin: Guided by the disembodied voice of Phoebe, Shadowhawk begins his quest to find a cure for the AIDS virus that is killing him. His first stop, Project Born Again where he encounters Chapel also trying to gain entrance. Unfortunately, the complex is being guarded by Shadowhawk's old nemesis, Hawk's Shadow.
ComicInfo.Title: The Monster Within Part One: Brothers Under the Skin
